properties.entry: INSERT /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertMember() */ INTO TBL_MEMBER A ( A.MEMBER_NO , A.EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptPwd() */ B.MEMBER_PWD FROM TBL_MEMBER B WHERE B.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.EMAIL = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ C.MEMBER_NO , C.EMAIL , C.MEMBER_PWD , C.MEMBER_NAME , C.PHONE , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.MODIFIED_DATE , C.BLACK_STATUS , C.MEMBER_ROLE , C.MEMBER_STATUS FROM TBL_MEMBER C WHERE C.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.EMAIL = ?
UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#updateMember() */ TBL_MEMBER D SET D.PHONE = ? , D.MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE D.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND D.EMAIL = ?
UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#deleteMember() */ TBL_MEMBER E SET E.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' , E.MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE E.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND E.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#updatePassword() */ TBL_MEMBER D SET D.MEMBER_PWD = ? , D.MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE D.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND D.MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberByName() */ E.EMAIL , E.ENROLL_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER E WHERE E.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND E.MEMBER_NAME = ?
SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberByPhone() */ E.EMAIL , E.ENROLL_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER E WHERE E.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND E.PHONE = ?
SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEmail() */ F.EMAIL , F.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER F WHERE F.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND F.EMAIL = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectResetMember() */ G.MEMBER_NO , G.MEMBER_NAME , G.EMAIL , G.MEMBER_PWD FROM TBL_MEMBER G WHERE G.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND G.MEMBER_NAME = ? AND G.EMAIL = ?
UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#updateResetPassword() */ TBL_MEMBER H SET H.MEMBER_PWD = ? , H.MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE H.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND H.EMAIL = ?
